greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number T(n,k) of set partitions of [n] where each subset is again partitioned into k nonempty subsets; triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=n, read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..140, flattened
maple: T:= proc(n, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(k=0, 0, add(
mathematica: col[k_] := col[k] = CoefficientList[Exp[(Exp[x]-1)^k/k!] + O[x]^(nmax+1), x][[k+1;;]] Range[k, nmax]!;
T[n_, k_] := Which[k == n, 1, k == 0, 0, True, col[k][[n-k+1]]];
Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, nmax}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Apr 26 2020 *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 02 2019
